aboutAlternative.text:
Entrepreneur in digital innovation, open-source software enthusiast, tribe leader

Specialties: Digital Innovation, Internet strategy, IT governance, team management, open-source software platforms, web usability, server architecture, agile project management, symfony framework, Node.js, book writing.

positions.title: CEO & co-founder
positions.description:
Marmelab is a Digital Innovation Workshop.
We identify, design and build solutions from start to finish, for companies placing technology at the heart of their strategy.
We gather together the best web and open-source talents to serve value creation, based on pragmatism, agility, and the taste of work well done.

positions.title: CTO, Directeur Technique
positions.description:
In charge of all the technical aspects of e-TF1 properties on Internet, mobile, IPTV, and Connect TV platforms.

* Delivering Web Content to 19M Unique Visitors according to Nielsen NetRatings
* Head of a team of 50 engineers dealing with:
** Software design
** Web Development
** Project Management
** Architecture
** Production
** Infrastructure
** R&D
* Managing a budget > 8M€
* Defining the IT strategy
…

positions.title: CTO
positions.description:
Management of the IT team (up to 7 people).
Design, development and monitoring of the software and hardware infrastructure of a B2C web portal (1M+ Unique Visitors NNR).
Leverage Agile techniques and Open-source Software (mostly PHP, MySQL and Symfony) to boost deliverability and lower costs.
…

positions.title: Manager
positions.description:
Project Management and Consulting on Web Application development, including early design decisions, technical orientations, usability expertise, day-to-day scheduling and follow-up of large projects.
Training, Auditing and Consulting on rapid application development with PHP5 and symfony. Authored "The Definitive Guide To Symfony" (Apress).
…

positions.title: Project Manager
positions.description:
Supervised the creation of the new ViaMichelin portal (replacement for the old michelin-travel.com portal) from a frontend point of view.
Wrote requirements, chose contractors, followed development, validated contractors work, maintained budget and planning.

positions.title: Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Mines de Nancy
positions.companyName:
Degree Name
Diplôme d'Ingénieur Civil des Mines

positions.title: Logistician/Administrator
positions.description: In a medical mission in Sierra Leone, at the end of a 10-year war, I was in charge of the logistics (security, cars, communications, stock, etc.) and administration (payroll for 80 employees, contracts, accounting) for a refugee camp, a pediatric unit in a regional hospital, and the health centers of three villages around.

educations.title: Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Mines de Nancy

given.text: J'ai travaillé 3 ans avec François. Il sait combiner la compétence technique, le management et l'enthousiasme. Il trouve toujours le compromis entre tous les points de vue. Ne vous laissez pas tromber par son air timide, il est redoutablement efficace mais modeste !

Collaboration with François brought to our projects a lot more than his skills and technical expertise. François is a smart, talented technology professional with a remarkable understanding of stakes, a solution oriented mindset, served with common sense and a sense of humor.

Working with François has always been a great pleasure. Even if he is not a web developer as he likes to say, he definitely has a very deep technical knowledge on everything related to the web. His best capacity: being fast; he understands things so quickly and he works so fast that you'd better be prepared. And be wa... See more

received.text:
Durant son stage de 3 mois, Dylan est monté en compétence rapidement sur un environnement technologique complètement nouveau pour lui. Sa polyvalence et sa qualité d'écoute ont été des atouts importants. Comme il a l'esprit d'équipe, il progresse d'autant plus vite. Il sait partager ses questionnements et ses découvertes. Cette expérience lui a permis de se familiariser avec le développement agile, la programmation asynchrone, Selenium et Contextor.

... See more

Robin is a fast learner. He became a proficient JavaScript developer within months of his arrival at marmelab, and started coaching newcomers with great success after a year. He detects and applies the best practises, writes robust and well tested code.

He does a lot of reading to find the most idiomatic way to write code, or the best open-source library to use for a particular purpose.

He's also a team player. He accepts criticism and is very constructive with other developers, too (we do systematic code reviews via pull requests). 

I'd definitely recommend him for any JavaScript-related mission (client side or server-side).

... See more
